body:
This PR changes the instructions in the template file for Spack-global licenses to:

* work around #6534 (2018 versions of Intel installers do not tolerate leading comments in some cases),
* leave the template *unchanged* if the system is already configured to use the license in question.

Related to #7469, but factored out for separate development and review.
title: Update instructions to initialize Spack-global license files
